meanings.definition: Give permission or approval for (a project or idea) to proceed.
meanings.sent1: The teacher greenlit the science experiment for the students.
meanings.sent2: The city council greenlit the construction of a new park.
meanings.sent3: The principal greenlit the idea of a school-wide talent show.
meanings.sent4: After much consideration, the committee greenlit the proposal for a community garden.
meanings.sent5: The manager greenlit the new marketing campaign, exciting the team.

meanings.sent1: The greenlit movie is set to start filming next month.
meanings.sent2: The greenlit video game will be released in time for the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The greenlit project received funding from investors.
meanings.sent4: The greenlit TV series has already gained a lot of attention.
meanings.sent5: The greenlit product is expected to be a bestseller.
